Ebe mmepụta ụgọala nke Ụlọ ọrụ Innoson
(nke mkpọbiri ya bụ IVM) bụ onye na eimepụta ụgbọala na Naijiria nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Nnewi, Anambra, Steti
Ọ bụ Chief Innocent Chukwuma Nwala guzobere ya. A na-akpọ Innoson Vehicle Manufacturing Pride Of African Road n'olu bekee.
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si kwuo, a na-emepụta percetị iri asaa ahụ ụgbọala ya n'Naijiria ebe percentị ndị ọzọ si mba Japan , China na Gremany.
N'ime ụdị ụgbọ ala IVM nwere, e nwere Fox nke nwere  oche ise na (1.5-litre engine) na Umunwere  (2-litra engine) nakwa obere bọsụ a kpọrọ Ụzo.
